A few days had passed since the three Goddesses\nhad each taken to their own festival plans.%K%P
Things were starting to take shape.%K%P
\dWow, not bad. People are gonna love this.\d%K%P
\dReally? You think so?\d%K%P
\dFor sure. It'll even be a hit with the tourists.\d%K%P
Kaede had asked me to be taste tester for the new\nmenu she'd whipped up.%K%P
She was going to have some of our shrine regulars\ntry it out later too, but I was the first step.%K%P
\dIs this all you're going to be making?\d%K%P
I asked her while sipping on the mushroom soup.%K%P
\dOf course not. I'm planning on making at least \nseven dishes. People could try them all and find\nwhich one they like best.\d%K%P
\dI was thinking maybe I'd make stamp cards, and\npeople could get stamps for each dish they try.\d%K%P
\dYou came up with that all by yourself?\d%K%P
\dOh, no, Shion gave me the idea. She's good at that\nsort of stuff, you know.\d%K%P
Kaede, you're being duped.%K%P
She's playing along for now, but Shion plans on\nusing you for her own ends.%K%P
\dSomething wrong, Akira?\d%K%P
\dNah, it's nothing.\d%K%P
Shion had already 'paid' me to keep my mouth shut.%K%P
It was a bit of a dirty play, but I guess it was\nall part of the competition.%K%P
\dThe view here never ceases to impress me.\d%K%P
We'd dropped by the falls on our way to the store.%K%P
It was always picturesque here, which made it worth\nthe trip in itself.%K%P
\dYou should set up some food to sell here, too.\d%K%P
\dYeah, I was trying to think of something that\nwould suit this spot.\d%K%P
There wasn't really any sort of 'red leaf'\nflavor that came to mind.%K%P
There were dishes that used leaf shapes and things\nlike that, but nothing had jumped out so far.%K%P
\dYou've already got plenty of savory food, so why\nnot go with something sweet?\d%K%P
\dSweet, huh...\d%K%P
\dYou don't have to do anything too complex. Just\ntry and picture what would taste best out in a\nbeautiful place like this...\d%K%P
\dYeah, I guess there's no need to make it flashy.\d%K%P
\dIt can get pretty chilly out here, so maybe some\nhot sweet beans...\d%K%P
\dHow about chestnuts instead?\d%K%P
\dThat's a great idea! This is just the right time\nof year for them, too.\d%K%P
\dBut hey, are you supposed to be giving out advice\nlike this?\d%K%P
\dProbably not. So don't go telling anyone, okay?\d%K%P
If Shion was going to try and pull one over on her,\nI might as well give Kaede a helpful nudge.%K%P
Can't help one and turn away the other.%K%P
\dHeh heh, all right. My lips are sealed.\d%K%P
\dThat's a promise.\d%K%P
\dBut...you're probably helping both of them out\njust the same, huh?\d%K%P
\dYou know, I really couldn't say!\d%K%P
\dOh you...\d%K%P
\dThank you, though. I'm sure everyone will love\nit.\d%K%P
\dMe too, of course.\d%K%P
Kaede's menu was really coming along.%K%P
There was so much to make that she was putting\ntogether multiple things at once.%K%P
\dWow, that smells amazing...\d%K%P
\dDon't go sneaking a taste just yet.\d%K%P
\dWait, you're going to let her try it later?\d%K%P
\dI couldn't say no to a face like that, right?\d%K%P
True, it would be cruel to deny someone a bite\nwhen it smelled that good.%K%P
Kaede finished frying up some things while Shion\nand I waited.%K%P
\dHere you are.\d%K%P
\dYES!\d *nom nom*%K%P
Shion bit right into it without waiting for one\nword of explanation.%K%P
\dOhhh yes... So crispy, yet so soft... So, so\ntasty!\d%K%P
\dThat's fried ayu with the eggs still intact. I\nfigured even visitors from far away would enjoy\nthis.\d%K%P
\dAll right, let me have a bite...\d%K%P
\dWow, this is so good!\d%K%P
\dIf you just salt and grill them they can get too\nhard, so I figured frying them would let me serve\nthem up fresh and delicious.\d%K%P
\dYou sure know your stuff.\d%K%P
\dShe's a master chef and always knows how to charm\nher guests.\d%K%P
\dOh come on now, I just want everyone to enjoy\nthemselves.\d%K%P
\dIt's still impressive. Shion could never pull off\nsomething like this in a million years.\d%K%P
\dWhat? Hey! Don't go casually dissing me like\nthat.\d%K%P
\dAm I wrong?\d%K%P
\dNo, but still...!\d%K%P
\dShion has her own fortes. She's the one who\nthought up every non-food part of my plan.\d%K%P
\dYeah...\d%K%P
Kaede was all-in on working with Shion.%K%P
She would make all the food, and Shion would\nhandle the rest.%K%P
The event itself would probably be a huge hit, but\nwas she even thinking about how that would affect\nthe poll results?%K%P
\dOh, hey, I put together a draft of what the stamp\ncard will look like. Can you check it out for me\nlater?\d%K%P
\dOf course. Thanks, Shion.\d%K%P
